a-frame vr scene, street with tall rainbow colored buildings
Make sure everything is in a single HTML file with embedded CSS and JS in a single code block to be used as a web app.

Certainly! Below is a simple A-Frame VR scene that features a street with tall rainbow-colored buildings. You can copy and paste this code into a single HTML file and open it in a web browser that supports WebVR.

```html
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>Rainbow Street VR</title>
    <script src="https://aframe.io/releases/1.2.0/aframe.min.js"></script>
    <style>
        body { margin: 0; }
        a-scene { height: 100vh; }
        .building { 
            position: relative; 
            width: 2; 
            height: 10; 
            depth: 2; 
            margin: 0 1; 
        }
    </style>
</head>
<body>
    <a-scene>
        <a-sky color="#87CEEB"></a-sky>
        
        <!-- Ground -->
        <a-box position="0 -0.5 0" width="100" height="0.1" depth="100" color="#7CFC00"></a-box>
        
        <!-- Rainbow Buildings -->
        <a-box position="-10 5 -10" class="building" color="#FF0000"></a-box>
        <a-box position="-6 5 -10" class="building" color="#FF7F00"></a-box>
        <a-box position="-2 5 -10" class="building" color="#FFFF00"></a-box>
        <a-box position="2 5 -10" class="building" color="#00FF00"></a-box>
        <a-box position="6 5 -10" class="building" color="#0000FF"></a-box>
        <a-box position="10 5 -10" class="building" color="#4B0082"></a-box>
        
        <!-- Camera -->
        <a-entity camera look-controls position="0 1.6 5"></a-entity>
    </a-scene>
</body>
</html>
```

### Instructions:
1. Copy the code above.
2. Paste it into a text editor and save the file with a `.html` extension (e.g., `rainbow_street.html`).
3. Open the saved HTML file in a web browser that supports A-Frame (like Chrome or Firefox).
4. You can enter VR mode if you have a VR headset connected.

This code creates a simple VR scene with a sky, ground, and a series of tall buildings in rainbow colors. Enjoy exploring your virtual street!
